sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getasmtValue</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getasmtValue</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var getasmtValue = Class.create();
 getasmtValue.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getasmtValue: function() {
        var number_1 = this.getParameter("sysparam_incident_number");  
        var case_id = '';  
        var sys_id_of_record = new GlideRecord('incident'); 
        sys_id_of_record.addQuery('sys_id', number_1);  
        sys_id_of_record.query();
        if (sys_id_of_record.next()) {
            //case_id  = sys_id_of_record.getDisplayValue();  
			case_id = sys_id_of_record.getValue('assigned_to');
        }
        return case_id; 
    }
});

/////////////////////

/////////////////////////////////]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-27 15:18:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>214650e147a13190020ba9f8536d4314</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getasmtValue</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_214650e147a13190020ba9f8536d4314</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:23:20</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
